ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.description: Oh, oh my, that's not good! Are you okay?
ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.title: Head Researcher

ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.description: I'll see who we can contact about this. In the meantime, let's get you out of there.
ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.title: Head Researcher

ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.description: If you head back down to the caves, you should be able to start making your way North to the settlement in the Lava Fields, there's some people that could really use your help.
ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.objective: Travel to the Lava Fields Settlement
ev_corrupt_fungal_defeat.title: Head Researcher

ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.description: Ah, hello there! It sounds like you've retrived the Lavaboard Prototype.
ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.title: Head Engineer

ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.description: Bring it back here and we'll see about getting it functional for you!
ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.objective: Return the Lavaboard Prototype to the Head Engineer
ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.title: Head Engineer

ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.description: Wait, what's that? The one who took it was all covered in Tech? We'll send someone out to investigate right away!
ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.title: Head Engineer

ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.description: You get back here safe now!
ev_corrupt_tech_defeat.title: Head Engineer

ev_cromet_defeated.description: If you're hearing this, that means your radio is working!
ev_cromet_defeated.title: Head Researcher

ev_cromet_defeated.description: It's great to hear you've dealt with the Cromet situation! They're a rarely seen species, so I appreciate the extra effort!
ev_cromet_defeated.title: Head Researcher

ev_cromet_defeated.description: Please investigate the cave system to the North-West! The researchers there seem to be having some trouble.
ev_cromet_defeated.title: Head Researcher

ev_intro.description: Welcome to the Oochamon Beta Test!
ev_intro.title: Intro

ev_intro.description: This game is currently VERY WIP, and many changes could and will be made, so we appreciate any and all feedback you may give!
ev_intro.title: Intro

ev_intro.description: Let's begin with selecting an Oochamon. Go on, choose one!
ev_intro.title: Intro

ev_intro.description: Great. Now would you like to do the tutorial? This will teach you how the game works and how it is controlled.
ev_intro.title: Intro

ev_intro.description: Perfect! With that, we shall continue onto the game! Enjoy the wonderful world of Oochamon!
ev_intro.title: Intro

ev_rival_intro.description: Thought you could get ahead of me, didn't you?
It's me, Cade, I knew you couldn't forget about me!
ev_rival_intro.title: Cade

ev_rival_intro.description: What do you say we have a little battle here? I hear you've got your first Oochamon, and I've been wanting to battle!
ev_rival_intro.title: Cade

ev_rival_intro.description: I was uh... Just going easy on you, yeah. There's no way you'd win if we battled it out for real!
ev_rival_intro.title: Cade

ev_rival_intro.description: Anyway, I've got some business to take care of, see ya around!
ev_rival_intro.title: Cade

ev_rival_intro.description: Oh my, isn't he a little bundle of energy? I'm sure he'll do quite well.
ev_rival_intro.title: Professor Lyra

ev_rival_intro.description: Now, as for yourself, would you come speak to me once more? I have your first task ready for you!
ev_rival_intro.title: Professor Lyra

ev_tutorial_1.description: Welcome to the world of Oochamon! I am a disembodied voice, I don't have a name, but you can call me the Tutorial Master!
To start, let's teach you how to move. Type in **w, a, s, or d** as a message in the chat to move, and move up to the door!
ev_tutorial_1.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_2.description: Let's also show you how to use *advanced movement tech!* (oooh, ahhh)
ev_tutorial_2.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_2.description: You can **jump** ahead tiles by putting a number after a movement key, or by typing a letter multiple times.
ev_tutorial_2.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_2.description: For example, you can do `w2` to jump 2 spaces forward, or `ddd` to jump 3 spaces to the right. Give it a try!
ev_tutorial_2.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_3.description: You can also chain these movement commands together, to do some crazy movement!
ev_tutorial_3.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_3.description: For example, you can do `w2d2` to move up 2 then right 2, or `aaaww` to move left 3 then up 2. Give it a try!
ev_tutorial_3.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_4.description: Now, check out your menu with `/menu`. You have an Oochamon you picked out, right?
ev_tutorial_4.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_4.description: Go check it out, and play around in the menu to learn about it a little bit. There's even a settings menu!
ev_tutorial_4.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_4.description: Head over to the next door upwards as soon as you are ready to move on.
ev_tutorial_4.objective: Check out the menu, then move on.
ev_tutorial_4.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_5.description: Let's get you a few items to start with. Here's a few Potions and a Prism.
ev_tutorial_5.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_5.description: Prisms are our way of capturing and taming the wild Oochamon of the world. It's very painless for them, I assure you.
ev_tutorial_5.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_5.description: Let's try out catching an Oochamon now. I've created a simulated Oochamon for you to learn catching with! It's inside the chest.
ev_tutorial_5.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_5.description:
You won't be able to keep this Oochamon after the tutorial, this is just to teach you how to capture things.
You will have ample opportunity to catch more on the planet.
ev_tutorial_5.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_5.objective: Catch the Oochamon, and move on to the next door.
ev_tutorial_5.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: Great work! If you look at that new Oochamon in your menu, you'll notice it has special stats, called **Bonuses**.
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: Bonuses are a special power an Oochamon has, unique to itself, that increase its various stats based on random chance.
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: We are researching a way to increase these to have an Oochamon reach it's ultimate power, but you may have to speak with the Researchers on that.
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: Oochamon also have special abilities! You can view what your Oochamon ability does using `/lookup ability`.
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: On that note, `/lookup` has a few other things to view as well, so keep the command in mind!
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_6.description: Move to the next door when you are ready.
ev_tutorial_6.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_7.description: Let's learn about the bread and butter of Oochamon. Trainer fights!
ev_tutorial_7.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_7.description: I've created a simulated trainer for you to fight. It's not a real person, but it still has feelings.
ev_tutorial_7.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_7.description: Anyways, go beat him up! This will be a good way for you to learn how to fight.
ev_tutorial_7.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_8.description: Great work. I knew you could do it! I'll give SimTrainer a cyber cookie later to make him feel better.
ev_tutorial_8.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_8.description: That's basically how the game works. Catch Oochamon, beat up peoples teams of Oochamon, and save the world!
ev_tutorial_8.title: Tutorial Master

ev_tutorial_8.description: Or something. I'm not your parent. See ya, and enjoy the grand world of Oochamon!
ev_tutorial_8.title: Tutorial Master
